EmailTemplate.name: Graduate Rep 2015
EmailTemplate.subject: Ingite Lockdown this Wednesday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Contact.FirstName}!
Ignite is fast approaching and that means it is time to...
Lockdown
Join us at the last phone party to get people confirmed for Ignite on Saturday.
There will be music, pizza and a whole lot of phones! We will brief you on what to say and make sure you are well prepared.
Come on down on Wednesday 25th November 5pm - 6:30pm The Challenge, Unit 2 (Follow the 'Valet Parking' sign), Highgate Studios, 53-79 Highgate Road, London, NW5 1TL
Nearest stations: Kentish Town & Gospel Oak
In the meantime, keep an eye out for emails containing vital information about this and other forthcoming events.
If you have any questions, feel free to email us back at
josephine.jengo@the-challenge.org
